explanation: Despite a large number of short-term bearish and volatile opinions (pullbacks, shorting, dumps, liquidation zones), the dominant sentiment leans toward an ultimate move higher for BTC. Key representative opinions highlight expectations of a bullish reversal, support holding, a double bottom pattern, and targets above current prices (e.g., 108,500, 110k, new ATH). Many traders reference buying dips, booking partial profits, and show fear of missing out on upward moves. Large liquidations below suggest downside risk is being absorbed, and several mention Wall Street propping up BTC and altcoins being sold to rotate into BTC. Technical references to trend lines, moving averages, and support add to the bullish case on the 1-minute candlestick. The neutral/sideways and consolidation commentary reflects healthy market digestion rather than breakdown.
